channel.title: How to change the starting equipment +(devolution)+ +(Help Me)+
channel.description: ok i was messing around on my source and i come across somthing unuasual, when i put the giving the playing a uniqe look in my starting stuff FIRST LOGIN, and i put in the items i want to have equipted and it comes up as 0 items insted of 1 with no number so it would look like a arrow on your arrows slot but it ses 0 and its actuly a zamorak robe top with a 0 sign so might have some one help me. sincerly, Killer 99.
